events.message: I was involved in a car collision yesterday and need to file a claim for the damages sustained.
The claim has been reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident for further processing.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the details of your car accident claim.
We acknowledge receipt of your car accident claim and will keep you updated throughout the process.
Please submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates for claim validation.
All requested documents including photos, police report, and mechanic estimate have been submitted successfully.
The investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision has begun as part of the claims process.
Investigation report finalized confirming the extent of damages and liability in the car accident.
A settlement offer covering repairs and medical expenses related to the accident has been proposed.
Customer has responded with approval of the proposed settlement and requested expedited payment.
The insurance claim has been approved and is ready for payment processing.
Payment for the approved settlement amount has been issued directly to the customer's account.
The claim has been officially closed following payment and confirmation of issue resolution.
All claim files and documentation related to the car accident have been securely archived for record keeping.
